item.description:
Let's meet at The Java Room to talk about all things related to Linux. Bring your Linux laptop, as The Java Room has free WiFi for its customers. We can also see if there are enough people to make this a regular event. Anybody with an interest in Linux is invited to attend! It doesn't matter if you are a new user or a guru (or something in between).

The Java Room is a coffee shop that has great coffee, desserts, water, soda, and more!

For more information, see http://www.thejavaroo...
item.name: Linux @ The Java Room
